pages.text: Stellar Resonators are your way to travel between existing Echoways in a single dimension.$(br2) For example, Echoway 1 and Echoway 2 both exist in the Overworld. The Stellar Resonantors are used to dial the address of the corresponding Echoway and provide instant travel to that location.
As it stands you cannot dial an address in another dimension using the Stellar Resonators. In the future this might be implemented.
